FuncDef: This command configures a Value Added Service filter.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a VAS filter name, up to 32 characters.
Keyword used to create the VAS filter instance. The create keyword requirement can be enabled or disabled in the environment>create context.

ExtraInfo: Default: This command configures a value added service (VAS) filter that can be associated to an L2-aware NAT host, and is matched on the NAT ISA to select flows for a host that needs to be steered to remote value-added services.
